title: Um, someone explain?
body:
I got destroyed this game...

Why did I get put in a Silver match up?

replies.body: It's 1 game calm
Multiple games actually until I lost the majority of them and back in my Bronze matches.
Shhh suck it up and get better and stop complaining in boards

lol all I asked was an explanation

i aint complaining
Explanation = complaining
So if I ask someone to explain to me what a certain word means, does that mean I'm complaining?
Ye pretty much

Im not sure what the confusion is here? You had a volibear with really high MMR (possibly duoing with you or another person on your team). 

The amount of times i've verused diamonds when i was climbing it plat was ridiculous. Its how you prove you belong in that elo. If you can't beat silvers, you probably don't belong in silver (match making logic). 

Also people in division 5 (silver 5/gold 5) can have an MMR thats lower, but they dont drop straight away. So those silver 5's may have had bronze MMR.

I was preferred solo, never really duo'd with anyone during the time.

But thanks for the explanation, looks like I need more practice to hit Silver.
That's pretty normal.
Well it's bothering me, now I'm losing games...

Just remember that ideal winrate is 50% and that MMR (which you can't see, but can find approximation on internet), sometimes gets higher than your actual rank, and that means you, as a bronze, will get matched with higher players, in some bounds of course, you won't have to deal with gold/plat, unless you climb, lol.

Welp, I guess its to stop people from getting out of Bronze easily to show that they actually belong in said rank?

Because I feel like I NEED A LOT to improve on since I can't win any of these Silver games.

That can mean only that you might belong in higher rank, since you probably won many games before.

The more you win in smaller amount of games, the more your mmr rises or something like that.
Apparently op.gg says my MMR is 1,049 nowâ€”after losing a few games. It was at 1,080 when I was getting these Silver games...
Well neither I, nor anyone else really knows how MMR is actually calculated, everything is approximation, so I have no idea.
Yah dynamo queue things. Nothing unusual. Try to learn from the stompings :^)
Welp, first thing I learnt is I can't support very well. XD

> [{quoted}](name=xDarkRavenx,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=6uLPHLEV,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-07T00:34:47.206+0000)
>
> Welp, first thing I learnt is I can't support very well. XD

You shoukd kearn support. Its a great role and you can carry from it regardless from what a lot of people say. Generally they say you cant carry from support because their support sucks.

Dynamic vs solo silvers

Happened to me and i only lost 8 lp

But here, I lost 20LP.

rip
